One of the most exciting and tensitive game I've ever experienced, being chased by a killer and never got caught. First time I've played this game in 2019 while it was on discount sale! 

You have to know this game has weird pattern, if you play as killer on the first time, you'll face survivors with your rank and having the same skills of your gameplay which means it's easy to play and having fun as killer, whereas playing as survivor on the first time is totally hard, you have to know all kind of loops and keep distancing from a killer. At the end of Depip (rising your rank), you would face very hard survivors with gen-rush and insane loopers!

Buy this game only on discount sales ğŸ‘ğŸ’¹

- 6th of July, 2021

Fun game, if its something that interests you. One of the worst communities I have seen in any game, both sides bitch about the other equally as bad. Balancing is also wack, and some game mechanics are just unfun.

I wish it did the horror side a little bit better but I think it does what it can.

I don't recommend the game for the price unless on sale, noting that DBD is on the gamepass if you want to try before you buy as well. I think there simply isn't enough forgiveness for newer players and in turn they will burn out quickly and leave the game.
I don't know why I still play this

Such a great game. The idea is so unique and the characters are so much fun. However there are a lot of toxic people in the game so beware of that. Also some characters are overpowered. Other than that the concept and maps are good and every single round is different. There are also many different ways to play with friends.

people complain about bugs and servers, and yeah they're big issues but the major one is devs are removing every skillbased mechanic from survivors' gameplay and turning it into a management game. what makes you the win is coordination with teammates and making choices about who should go for the save, who should hide, which gens to rush first, which pallet using first... etc then you can be an absolute monkey and camp every pallet, mindgames and loop efficiency isnt a skill required anymore. you could say im wrong by watching your favourite youtuber with 5000 hours that uploads matches against killers with 300 hours or less. but proof is, if you watch even a high-level tournament (ikr dbd its not competitive and competitive clans are the most cringe experience ever BUT they're still good players trying to win for really high prizes sometimes so) most of the gameplay is genrushing, coordination and camping every single pallets that allows a mindgame for the killer if looped. (almost every of them). devs are balancing the game about this instead of making the game enhance most the chase skill and fast thinking. and this is imho the major issue but this game has so many this review would be the divine comedy if i keep going. so if (like most of dbd's community) you want an easy game when you just gotta learn few things to get to the "top" and boost your ego by winning easy because in other games where skill is involved you always get clapped, sure, dbd is the perfect game for you. otherwise avoid it at all cost. you'll just start loving it if you understand its true potential but then you'll get increasingly angry at devs wasting it.

"just play something else" -Mathieu Cote, the game director.
Te lo resumo , el juego esta muerto, te puede tardar de 10 a 15 minutos encontrar partida a las 2pm y no te digo mas temprano por que simplemente no encuentra partida.
great game, horror filled suspense that keeps you on your toes. i enjoy this game and would recommedn if you like horror games you will love this
one of the sweatiest games i have played
Honestly, it's just a fun game.
